favourite.article: It’s no statue that I call, Not a picture on the wall, But a person who lives His life within me. From the time I call your name ...Oh my Jesus You are a true friend . I wish I could sing this song. The first time I listened to it my life changed. God bless you all the proprietor of the site. Amen.
From the time I spoke Your name, Lord my life's not been the same. I know, Lord Jesus You're alive.
It is very nice to sing for the great Lord of Host.

An alternate stanza 2 for those of you who have no friends, like me: Though all around me is despair— Since I touched You, I don’t care— For I’ve found You’re the only life worth living. Though some mock and criticize, Lord, they just don’t realize That I’ve found out, Jesus, You’re alive!
"From the time I spoke Your name, Lord, my life's not been the same, Since I called on the only One who'd save me." Lord I just need You!
I don't care now how I feel; I just know that this is real, and I know, O Jesus, You're alive!!

"It’s no statue that I call, Not a picture on the wall, But a person who lives His life within me. Wish they’d told me long before, All You want’s an open door And that really, Jesus, You’re alive!" O Lord Jesus! You are real and alive, not a lifeless statue or picture! You can come inside of us to be our life!!!!!

"I don’t care now how I feel; I just know that this is real, And I know, oh Jesus, You’re alive!"
Amen. JESUS now lives in us :-) Hallelujah! :-D

But a person who lives His life within me.
O Jesus, live Your life through us today and teach us to submit to You instead of insisting on our own way. Thank You that You saved me and that Your Spirit lives in me. Amen.
Amen, Hallelujah! He is "Not a picture on the wall, but a person who lives His life within me." Thank You, Lord Jesus for living inside of me!
I love this song very much because I feel relaxed every time I sing this song, and I really like to recite this song so that everywhere and everything I worked I can sing this. I love You Jesus...
I love this song very much...I love JESUS....

"All my friends might think it's square— Since I touched You, I don't care— For I've found You're the only life worth living. Though some mock and criticize, Lord, they just don't realize That I've found out, Jesus, You're alive!"
Hallelujah for such a glorious declaration! Praise Jesus!! I love Jesus Christ. My life belongs to Him.

Amen. calling Oh Lord Jesus! is so sweet. It's not a statue that we call, nor a picture on the wall. As Christians in the Lord's recovery it must be our breathing: Exercise every moment and reading His word must be our Daily diet, then finally Praying must be our thirst quencher to drink Him.

This a glorious song of dedication to the Lord. I miss singing it with the other dear saints on KNUST campus. Our meetings were always filled with singing and rejoicing in the Lord. Hallelujah for Christ and the church.
Praise the Lord. I am blessed with this song. How I wish you will have the complete music sheets for SATB voices.
Oh Lord Jesus! We praise and thank You for You are the ever living God. We love to call Your name. Amen.

When I spoke ont he Lords name I just knew He was alive in me. The burning turning God whos in my heart. Poeple say hes a statue or a picture, but for Christians he is the living one. ALL YOU WANTS A OPEN DOOR AND THAT REALLY JESUS YOU'RE ALIVE!
The Lord is so great and awesome! I love to speak the name of the One I love!!! He is rich to all who call upon His name! Oh Lord Jesus!
I love this song because from the time I spoke His name my life has not been the same, since I called on the only One who saved me and now I know Lord Jesus You are alive.
Amen, this is a very special hymn...it shows us how Jesus is real in our lives....Amen...I really enjoy that.
Yes, Sandy. The Lord is so alive!!! Even without consciously calling Him we know that He's still there for us. How much more if we call on His name, Jesus!!! How sweet! How marvelous!

Praise the Lord! The name of our Lord Jesus is a new discovery for me. How sweet it is to call up the name of the Lord! When I call Him, the person of the Lord just wells up from inside of me and indeed, I know He is alive!
